channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AR

item.title: Report E-2025030410
item.description:
Report E-2025030410

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-27T15:24:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-27
  • City: LITTLE ROCK
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1646 ET, XPO-LLR notified ERTS of a cargo release. It was reported that approximately 2 teaspoons of masterpro refinishing 5700CA released from a metal pail due to forklift accident. The release impacted the concrete dock. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site.
